description:
A no-coding solution for web scraping to turn pages into structured data within clicks.


Whatâ€™s New
- Added notifications when add-on credits run low
- Enabled custom data field selection for more precise data exports
- Enhanced scheduling options with flexible time intervals, including minutes, hours, days, weeks, and months
- Enabled boost mode for local extraction in specific template tasks
- Optimized auto-export for cloud runs
- Improved template task splitting to enhance cloud extraction efficiency
- Account status now updates automatically after purchasing or renewing a subscription
- Improved the template parameter input experience for better usability
- Streamlined data extraction steps for a smoother workflow

Bug fixes
- Fixed several minor bugs from the previous version
